Text.Page: Braga in Highwatch wishes to meet you.
Braga in Highwatch wishes to meet you.

I heard you've been re-outfitting yourself with more powerful gear. Good, Good, we need you back on the front lines as soon as possible.

Do you mind if I take a look at your equipment?"Help yourself."

Not bad.

You've done an almost complete equipment refresh. And it can all be upgraded.

You're just missing a couple pieces, and I can help you with that.

You'll need...a brooch,a circlet,and some inner armor.

Let me give you an innerwear coupon and a brooch.

For the next phase of your development, you'll want an item level of at least 428.

You should also be looking ahead to enchanting and upgrading your gear to face more serious challenges. You'll find what you need by completing dungeons."Dungeons?"

Indeed. Dungeons drop all sorts of enchanting materials. And when you fully enchant a piece of gear, you can upgrade it to a more powerful version. Your accessories can be upgraded at any time, assuming you have the right materials at hand.

Eventually, you'll want an item level of at least 439 to tackle even tougher challenges.

I have faith that you'll make us all proud!
